title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When I try to view the type hierarchy on a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant), I receive the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, could you please explain what this error message means?
OB: When attempting to view the type hierarchy on a binary project, such as 'org.apache.ant', the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'' is displayed.
SR:
1. Open a binary project, e.g. 'org.apache.ant'.
2. Try to view the type hierarchy.
3. Observe the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant''.
